item.description:
EVENT: A chance to ski on over 15 km of trails only 20 minutes from Boston at the
Weston Ski Track. Weston has a 2km loop with manmade snow. Hopefully more snow
will fall on the Weston Ski area but not in our driveways! The Ski Track has equipment
rentals as well as snow shoeing and XC lessons For more information, go to:
http://www.paddlebost...

Trip's Coordinator: Michael Oliverio
MEET: at Weston Ski Track at 12:15PM- letâ€™s hit the trails by 12:30PM.
Bring a snack and some liquid refreshment for out on the trail. Snack Bar available
RSVP: NOT MANDATORY but appreciated by February 12th As long as there is snow Mike will be there.
Cost: $15 trail pass, ski rentals are $15 and snowshoes $13 plus $5 for guests.
Keep a look out for discounts on Groupon,CoupMe and BuyWithMe
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and plans will be made

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: XC SKIING and SNOW-SHOEING AT WESTON SKI TRACK
